statements: SELECT * FROM patient_info;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patient_info ORDER BY last_name;
SELECT * FROM patient_info WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01' AND date_of_birth <= '1995-12-31';
SELECT first_name, last_name, demographics->>'gender' AS gender FROM patient_info WHERE demographics->>'age_group' = 'Young Adult';
SELECT first_name, medical_history FROM patient_info WHERE medical_history ILIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT * FROM patient_info WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM patient_info WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patient_info WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, demographics FROM patient_info ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date_of_birth) AS birth_year FROM patient_info GROUP BY birth_year HAVING COUNT(patient_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM patients
SELECT patient_id, medical_history FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC
SELECT provider_name, license_number FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology'
SELECT * FROM patients p JOIN healthcare_providers hp ON p.patient_id = hp.provider_id
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT medical_history FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Dentist';
SELECT patient_id, demographic_data->>'gender' AS gender FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM patients JOIN healthcare_providers ON patients.patient_id = healthcare_providers.provider_id;
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patient ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, medical_history FROM Patient WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM Appointment ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT provider_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointment WHERE provider_name='Dr. Smith';
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE age > 50;
SELECT name, age FROM Patient WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT name, medical_history FROM Patient WHERE age >= 18 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Appointment WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT patient_id, city, state FROM Demographics WHERE zip_code LIKE '%00' ORDER BY state, city;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, hospital_name FROM doctors WHERE hospital_name='City Hospital';
SELECT patient_name, age, DATE_PART('year', age(CURRENT_DATE, date_of_birth)) AS age_in_years FROM patients;
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity FROM facilities ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1970-01-01'
SELECT * FROM appointments JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith'
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facilities WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT * FROM doctors WHERE hospital_name = 'ABC Hospital'
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, phone_number FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM MedicalHistory ORDER BY date_of_visit DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, location FROM HealthcareProviders;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM Patients JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, city, state FROM Patients JOIN Demographics ON Patients.patient_id = Demographics.patient_id WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT provider_name, specialty, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM HealthcareProviders JOIN Appointments ON HealthcareProviders.provider_id = Appointments.provider_id;
